page.title: 05Barkestone Redmile churches
page.content: There are two churches in Plungar one is a chapel and one is a church of England. The vicar is Rev.Subbings. all Barkestone, Plungar and Redmile churches were built in 1200.The services are held the first month on the first Sunday at 10.00 the second Sunday at 10.00 the third Sunday at 11.00 and the fourth Sunday at 6.30. Plungar church has 2 bells they are both rung.There is an organ and it is played by Miss Clower. There is one church in Barkestone and Redmile.The vicar is Rev.Subbings. The services are held at the first month on the first Sunday at 6.30, the second Sunday at 9.30 the third at 10.00 and the fourth at 11.00 Barkestone church has four bells and they are all rung.
